Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • grid.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a map on drawing surface
    Version:
    5/24/22
    Author:
    Joshua Lee & Jacob Tang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(DrawingSurface surface)
      creates a new map with boundaries

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)

      • isNextValid

        public boolean isNextValid(double x,
                           double y)
        Tests whether the next point is a valid point and is not in the boundaries set within the map
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the next move
        y - y coordinate of the next move
        Returns:
        true if the point is a valid point false otherwise
